mapper.select:
SELECT * ,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS new_date ,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') AS new_date FROM report_bin WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeStart}, '%Y-%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m')
order BY ware_code,create_time

SELECT SUM(material_occupy_bin) AS material_occupy_bin,SUM(product_occupy_bin) AS product_occupy_bin,SUM(total_bin) AS total_bin
,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') AS new_date,ware_code FROM report_bin WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeStart}, '%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY ware_code ,new_date order BY ware_code,new_date
SELECT CODE from md_department GROUP BY CODE

SELECT md.code AS code, COUNT(md.code) as number count(ware_code) AS number, ware_code AS code FROM si_material_receive mr left join md_material mm on mr.material_nb = mm.code and mm.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN md_material_type mt ON mm.material_type_id = mt.id left join md_department md on mt.department_id = md.id WHERE mr.delete_flag=0 AND md.code=#{cell} AND ware_code =#{wareCode} GROUP BY code GROUP BY ware_code

SELECT count(md.code) AS number, md.code AS code count(sm.ware_code) AS number, sm.ware_code AS code FROM si_material_in sm LEFT JOIN bi_in bi ON bi.sscc_number = sm.sscc_number AND bi.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN si_material_receive smr ON smr.sscc_number = sm.sscc_number AND smr.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN md_material mm ON sm.material_nb = mm.code AND mm.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN md_material_type mt ON mm.material_type_id = mt.id left join md_department md on mt.department_id = md.id WHERE sm.delete_flag = 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM bi_in WHERE bi_in.sscc_number = sm.sscc_number AND bi_in.delete_flag = 1) AND md.code=#{cell} AND sm.ware_code =#{wareCode} AND (bi.status = 0 or sm.sscc_number not in (SELECT sscc_number from bi_in WHERE delete_flag = 0 and `status` = 1)) GROUP BY md.code GROUP BY sm.ware_code

SELECT COUNT(order_number) as number,cell as code COUNT(ware_code)as number,ware_code as code FROM material_kanban WHERE STATUS >= 1 AND STATUS <= 5 AND delete_flag=0 AND cell=#{cell} AND ware_code=#{wareCode} GROUP BY cell GROUP BY ware_code

SELECT md.code AS code,count(md.code) AS NUMBER ws.source_ware_code AS code,count(ws.source_ware_code) AS NUMBER FROM ware_shift ws LEFT JOIN md_material mm ON ws.material_nb = mm.code AND mm.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN md_material_type mt ON mm.material_type_id = mt.id left join md_department md on mt.department_id = md.id WHERE ws.delete_flag=0 AND (ws.STATUS>=1 AND ws.STATUS<=5) AND md.code=#{cell} AND ws.source_ware_code=#{wareCode} GROUP BY md.code GROUP BY ws.source_ware_code

SELECT t1.*
FROM bi_stock t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT batch_nb, MIN(create_time) AS min_create_time,MIN(id) AS id FROM bi_stock WHERE delete_flag = 0 GROUP BY batch_nb) t2 ON t1.id = t2.id

SELECT t1.*
FROM bi_stock t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT batch_nb, MIN(create_time) AS min_create_time FROM bi_stock WHERE delete_flag = 0 GROUP BY batch_nb) t2 ON t1.batch_nb = t2.batch_nb AND t1.create_time = t2.min_create_time WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND expire_date <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY batch_nb

SELECT t.car_nb,ws.* from ware_shift ws LEFT JOIN transhipment_order t ON ws.id=t.ware_shift_id AND t.delete_flag=0 WHERE ws.delete_flag=0 and source_ware_code LIKE concat('%', #{sourceWareCode}, '%') and target_ware_code LIKE concat('%', #{targetWareCode}, '%') and car_nb LIKE concat('%', #{carNb}, '%') and sscc_nb LIKE concat('%', #{ssccNb}, '%') ORDER BY create_time desc

SELECT create_by , MAX( CASE operation_type WHEN '1' THEN nb ELSE 0 END ) AS 'bin_in', MAX( CASE operation_type WHEN '2' THEN nb ELSE 0 END ) AS 'bin_out', MAX( CASE operation_type WHEN '3' THEN nb ELSE 0 END ) AS 'bin_out_other', MAX( CASE operation_type WHEN '4' THEN nb ELSE 0 END ) AS 'pallet_split', MAX( CASE operation_type WHEN '5' THEN nb ELSE 0 END ) AS 'pallet_turnover' FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS nb,create_by ,operation_type , CASE operation_type WHEN '1' THEN 'bin_in' WHEN '2' THEN 'bin_out' WHEN '3' THEN 'bin_out_other' WHEN '4' THEN 'pallet_split' WHEN '5' THEN 'pallet_turnover' ELSE 'other' END AS type_name FROM user_operation_log GROUP BY create_by ,operation_type)AS t where 1=1 and create_by like concat('%', #{createBy}, '%') and create_time >= #{createTimeStart} and create_time <= #{createTimeEnd} GROUP BY create_by
